thread.section_title: Allen School of Health Sciences Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Allen School of Health Sciences | allenschool.edu
thread.title: Karina
thread.title_full: Allen School of Health Sciences reviewed by Karina

author: Karina
title: Karina
text: I started classes in Allen School end of November 2016 and have had a great experience so far. The whole process starting from admission down to counselors have been so helpful. With working full time plus 2 babies the school has really made it easy for me to attention the classes. Once you find a routine for yourself, the classes will go fast and smooth. I would definitely recommend this school to friends and family.
